reqs:
Pre-reqs: A score of 65% or higher in one of APSC 176, ENGL 110, ENGL 111, ENGL 112, ENGL 120, ENGL 121.
Co-reqs: All of MECH 220, MECH 221, MECH 222, MECH 223, MECH 224, MECH 225.
Only students who are registered in Mech 2 can take this course. This course cannot be taken independently from the rest of the Mech 2 curriculum.
description: Written and oral communication. Preparation of design reports, business correspondence, verbal, online, and visual presentation of technical material. Restricted to students in the second year of Mechanical Engineering.
